attributes.title: TIKTOK
attributes.review: So I tried the app HORRIBLE IT DOESNT WORK POPERLY. And after seeing how bad he was to respond to COVID even tho he had a head start shows how dumb he is. He shot for the stars✨but he shot himself💋. Dont ever try again. This app was gass🤒 but take out the g✨💫.

attributes.title: nasty
attributes.review: I don’t get how so republicans can say he’s a great president when he’s a racist white supremacist and is a rapist anyways horrible app don’t get it. it glides out and try’s to steal your information.

attributes.title: Nope
attributes.review: Horrible app!!! It took a long time to download and it made my phone even slower. It used a lot of data too!! I don’t recommend to anyone!!

attributes.title: donald trump is a white supremacist
attributes.review: if you vote for donald trump, your a white supremacist. please anyone who is reading this, do your part and help us. rate this app 1 star, leave a terrible review, and report all positive comments. PLEASE

attributes.title: Don’t ban tiktok

attributes.title: Horrible
